DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the present work is to explore and compare the diagnostic quality of sputum specimens obtained by BAL, induction with hypertonic saline (3%), and induction with INS316 in patients diagnosed with interstitial lung diseases.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Diagnostic Utility of INS316 in Patients With Interstitial Lung Diseases (01-701)
DOC.criteria: between 18 years or older undergone diagnostic bronchoalveolar lavage within the previous 21 days diagnosed with sarcoidosis or other ILD having resting hypoxemia receiving corticosteroid treatment
